languages.text: Вольный Торговец отрывает силовой ключ от мехадендрита техножреца и вскрывает кожух терминала. Искры сыпятся {mf|ему|ей} на лицо, однако капитан уверенно манипулирует связками проводов и грохочущими рычагами. Опустив кожух на место и убедившись, что система восстановлена, Лорд-капитан выводит на экраны нужную информацию.

traits.locale_text: Вольный Торговец отрывает силовой ключ от механодендрита техножреца и вскрывает кожух терминала. Искры сыпятся {mf|ему|ей} на лицо, однако капитан уверенно манипулирует связками проводов и грохочущими рычагами. Через время система восстанавливается, и на экраны выводится нужная информация:

languages.text: The Rogue Trader rips the power key off the Tech-Priest's mechadendrite and opens the cover on the terminal. Sparks fly into {mf|his|her} face, but {mf|he|she} is confident in {mf|his|her} manipulation of the tangled wires and clanging levers. After replacing the cover and ensuring that the system is restored, the Lord Captain brings up the required data on the screens.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец отрывает силовой ключ от мехадендрита техножреца и вскрывает кожух терминала. Искры сыпятся {mf|ему|ей} на лицо, однако капитан уверенно манипулирует связками проводов и грохочущими рычагами. Опустив кожух на место и убедившись, что система восстановлена, Лорд-капитан выводит на экраны нужную информацию.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader rips the power key off the Tech-Priest's mechadendrite and opens the cover on the terminal. Sparks are flying into {mf|his|her} face, but {mf|he|she} is confident in {mf|his|her} manipulations with the tangles of wires and clanging levers. Having lowered the cover back into place and ensured that the system is restored, the Lord Captain pulls the required data onto the screens.

The Rogue Trader rips the power key off the Tech-Priest's mechadendrite and opens the cover on the terminal. Sparks are flying into {mf|his|her} face, but {mf|he|she} is confident in {mf|his|her} manipulations with the tangles of wires and clanging levers. Having lowered the cover back into place and ensured that the system is restored, the Lord Captain pulls the required data onto the screens.

The Rogue Trader rips the power key off the Tech-Priest's mechadendrite and opens the cover on the terminal. Sparks fly into {mf|his|her} face, but {mf|he|she} is confident in {mf|his|her} manipulation of the tangled wires and clanging levers. After replacing the cover and ensuring that the system is restored, the Lord Captain brings up the required data on the screens.

The Rogue Trader rips the power key off the Tech-Priest's mechadendrite and opens the cover on the terminal. Sparks fly into {mf|his|her} face, but {mf|he|she} is confident in {mf|his|her} manipulation of the tangled wires and clanging levers. After replacing the cover and ensuring that the system is restored, the Lord Captain brings up the required data on the screens.

The Rogue Trader rips the power key off the Tech-Priest's mechadendrite and opens the cover on the terminal. Sparks fly into {mf|his|her} face, but {mf|he|she} is confident in {mf|his|her} manipulation of the tangled wires and clanging levers. After replacing the cover and ensuring that the system is restored, the Lord Captain brings up the required data on the screens.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente arranca la llave que el tecnosacerdote lleva en su mecadendrita y abre la tapa del terminal. Saltan chispas frente a su rostro, pero confía plenamente en su manipulación de los cables enmarañados y las palancas ruidosas. Tras devolver la tapa a su sitio y comprobar que el sistema está restaurado, {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} muestra los datos necesarios en la pantalla.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader rips the power key off the Tech-Priest's mechadendrite and opens the cover on the terminal. Sparks fly into {mf|his|her} face, but {mf|he|she} is confident in {mf|his|her} manipulation of the tangled wires and clanging levers. After replacing the cover and ensuring that the system is restored, the Lord Captain brings up the required data on the screens.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente arranca la llave que el tecnosacerdote lleva en su mecadendrita y abre la tapa del terminal. Saltan chispas frente a su rostro, pero confía plenamente en su manipulación de los cables enmarañados y las palancas ruidosas. Tras devolver la tapa a su sitio y comprobar que el sistema está restaurado, {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} muestra los datos necesarios en la pantalla.

languages.text: 行商浪人从技术神甫的机械触须上扯下了电源钥匙，打开了终端的盖子。火花飞溅到{mf|他|她}的脸上，但{mf|他|她}游刃有余地{mf||}操作着纠缠在一起的电线与叮咣作响的各种拉杆。更换了终端盖子，确保系统恢复之后，领主舰长顺利地在屏幕上调出了所需的数据。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader rips the power key off the Tech-Priest's mechadendrite and opens the cover on the terminal. Sparks fly into {mf|his|her} face, but {mf|he|she} is confident in {mf|his|her} manipulation of the tangled wires and clanging levers. After replacing the cover and ensuring that the system is restored, the Lord Captain brings up the required data on the screens.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人从技术祭司的机械触须上扯下了电源钥匙，打开了终端的盖子。火花飞溅到{mf|他|她}的脸上，但{mf|他|她}游刃有余地{mf||}操作着纠缠在一起的电线与叮咣作响的各种拉杆。更换了终端盖子，确保系统恢复之后，领主舰长顺利地在屏幕上调出了所需的数据。

languages.text: 自由開拓者は技術司祭の機械触手から電源キーを引き抜き、端末のカバーを開ける。火花が顔に飛び散るものの、絡まったワイヤーとカタカタと音を立てるレバーの扱いには自信がある。カバーを元に戻し、システムが復元されたことを確認した後、ロード・キャプテンは必要なデータを画面に表示した。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader rips the power key off the Tech-Priest's mechadendrite and opens the cover on the terminal. Sparks fly into {mf|his|her} face, but {mf|he|she} is confident in {mf|his|her} manipulation of the tangled wires and clanging levers. After replacing the cover and ensuring that the system is restored, the Lord Captain brings up the required data on the screens.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者は技術司祭の機械触手から電源キーを引き抜き、端末のカバーを開ける。火花が顔に飛び散るものの、絡まったワイヤーとカタカタと音を立てるレバーの扱いには自信がある。カバーを元に戻し、システムが復元されたことを確認した後、ロード・キャプテンは必要なデータを画面に表示した。

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} reißt dem Tech-Priester den Energieschlüssel von den Mechadendriten und öffnet die Abdeckung des Terminals. Funken fliegen {mf|ihm|ihr} ins Gesicht, aber {mf|er|sie} kann die verwickelten Drähte und klappernden Hebel sicher handhaben. Nachdem er die Abdeckung wieder angebracht und sich vergewissert hat, dass das System wiederhergestellt ist, zeigt der Lord Captain die erforderlichen Daten auf den Bildschirmen an.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader rips the power key off the Tech-Priest's mechadendrite and opens the cover on the terminal. Sparks fly into {mf|his|her} face, but {mf|he|she} is confident in {mf|his|her} manipulation of the tangled wires and clanging levers. After replacing the cover and ensuring that the system is restored, the Lord Captain brings up the required data on the screens.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} arrache la clé que le technoprêtre tenait dans une de ses mécadendrites et ouvre le terminal. Malgré les étincelles qui en jaillissent, {mf|il|elle} manipule avec assurance les câbles emmêlés et les leviers bruyants. Après avoir refermé le terminal et vérifié que le système fonctionne correctement, {mf|il|elle} affiche les données requises sur les écrans.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader rips the power key off the Tech-Priest's mechadendrite and opens the cover on the terminal. Sparks fly into {mf|his|her} face, but {mf|he|she} is confident in {mf|his|her} manipulation of the tangled wires and clanging levers. After replacing the cover and ensuring that the system is restored, the Lord Captain brings up the required data on the screens.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} arrache la clé que le technoprêtre tenait dans une de ses mécadendrites et ouvre le terminal. Malgré les étincelles qui en jaillissent, {mf|il|elle} manipule avec assurance les câbles emmêlés et les leviers bruyants. Après avoir refermé le terminal et vérifié que le système fonctionne correctement, {mf|il|elle} affiche les données requises sur les écrans.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, güç anahtarını Tekno Rahip'in mekadentritinden söküp terminalin kapağını açıyor. Yüzüne kıvılcımlar saçılsa da dolanmış kablolar ile çınlayan kolları gerekli yerlere oturttuğuna emin. Lord Kaptan, kapağı değiştirdikten ve sistemi eski hâline getirdikten sonra gerekli verileri ekrana veriyor.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader rips the power key off the Tech-Priest's mechadendrite and opens the cover on the terminal. Sparks fly into {mf|his|her} face, but {mf|he|she} is confident in {mf|his|her} manipulation of the tangled wires and clanging levers. After replacing the cover and ensuring that the system is restored, the Lord Captain brings up the required data on the screens.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir, güç anahtarını Tekno Rahip'in mekadentritinden söküp terminalin kapağını açıyor. Yüzüne kıvılcımlar saçılıyor ama o, dolanmış kablolar ile çınlayan kolları gerekli yerlere oturttuğuna emin. Lord Kaptan, kapağı değiştirdikten ve sistemi eski hâline getirdikten sonra gerekli verileri ekrana veriyor.
